description: The function is vulnerable to SQL Injection (CWE-89) because it does not properly sanitize the user input before using it in SQL queries. It is also vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) (CWE-79) because it does not properly sanitize user input before using it in the output. The function is also vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) (CWE-352) because it does not verify whether the request was intentionally sent by the user.
